markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Lizardfolk Warrior](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2271)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Lizardfolk Warrior](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2271)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="CN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Lizardfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=226" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 139

**Perception** +7

**Languages**
[Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Iruxi](/Languages.aspx?ID=32)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +6, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +8, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +6, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +2

**Con** +3

**Int** +0

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[javelins](/Weapons.aspx?ID=71) (10), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [Longspear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=6)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +7 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 36

</row>

**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** <actions string="Reaction" />

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, swim 15 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
longspear +10 ([Reach](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d8+6 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +10,
**Damage** 1d6+6 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tail +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 1d4+6 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
javelin +8 ([thrown 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+4 piercing

**Deep Breath**   A lizardfolk warrior can hold their breath for 180 rounds (18 minutes).

**Sudden Charge** <actions string="Two Actions" />  With a quick sprint, the lizardfolk warrior dashes up to their foe and swings. They Stride or [Swim](/Actions.aspx?ID=39) twice. If they end their movement within melee reach of at least one enemy, they can make a melee Strike against that enemy.

**Terrain Advantage**   Non-lizardfolk creatures in difficult terrain and non-lizardfolk creatures that are in water and lack a swim Speed are flat-footed to the lizardfolk warrior.

</column>
name: Lizardfolk Warrior

text: Lizardfolk Warrior Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 18 Unspecific Lore : DC 16 Specific Lore : DC 13 Lizardfolk Warrior Source Kingmaker Adventure Path pg. 139 Perception +7 Languages Draconic, Iruxi Skills Acrobatics +6, Athletics +8, Stealth +6, Survival +7 Str +4 Dex +2 Con +3 Int +0 Wis +1 Cha +0 Items javelins (10), Leather Armor, Longspear --- AC 17 Fort +9 Ref +8 Will +7 HP 36 Attack of Opportunity Reaction --- Speed 25 feet, swim 15 feet Melee Single Action longspear +10 (Reach), Damage 1d8+6 piercing Melee Single Action jaws +10, Damage 1d6+6 piercing Melee Single Action tail +10 (Agile), Damage 1d4+6 bludgeoning Ranged Single Action javelin +8 (thrown 30 feet), Damage 1d6+4 piercing Deep Breath A lizardfolk warrior can hold their breath for 180 rounds (18 minutes). Sudden Charge Two Actions With a quick sprint, the lizardfolk warrior dashes up to their foe and swings. They Stride or Swim twice. If they end their movement within melee reach of at least one enemy, they can make a melee Strike against that enemy. Terrain Advantage Non-lizardfolk creatures in difficult terrain and non-lizardfolk creatures that are in water and lack a swim Speed are flat-footed to the lizardfolk warrior.
